sentences.sContent: Her father is now 86 and in fragile health.
sentences.sCn: 她的父亲现在86岁，身体虚弱。

sentences.sContent: ...Now it will be her job to get the Fed and the markets out of the biggest and most unconventional monetary program in history without derailing the fragile recovery...

phrases.pCn: [精神病学]脆性X综合征；X染色体易损综合征

words.tran: 脆弱；[力] 易碎性；虚弱

trans.tranOther: weak and uncertain; easily destroyed or spoilt
